effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,716 Parry and 3,354 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 86,740 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thorns of the Risen Nightmare

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Use: Gain 4 stacks of Platinum Plating for 30 sec, increasing your Armor by 10,564. Receiving more than 10% of your health from a Physical damage effect will remove one stack of Platinum Plating. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 9.6 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 848,406 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle

spells.description:
Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
